articles.description: Real Madrid show they are the masters of the Champions League high-wire act as Borussia Dortmund are beaten at Wembley, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Champions League final: Real Madrid pull off another high-wire act to win

articles.description: Novak Djokovic reaches the French Open fourth round with a five-set win over Lorenzo Musetti that ends at 03:07 local time in Paris.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Novak Djokovic beats Lorenzo Musetti in five-set epic

articles.description: Aaron Jones hits an unbeaten 94 as T20 World Cup co-hosts USA beat Canada by seven wickets in a pulsating tournament opener in Texas.
articles.title: T20 World Cup 2024: USA beat Canada in tournament opener

articles.description: Follow live text coverage of Queensberry vs Matchroom 5v5 event with Deontay Wilder vs Zhilei Zhang headlining in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Queensberry vs Matchroom 5v5: Deontay Wilder vs Zhilei Zhang, boxing fight time, undercard & text

articles.description: Jude Bellingham says he "couldn't have dreamed it better" after ending his first season with Real Madrid by winning the Champions League.
articles.title: Dortmund 0-2 Real Madrid: Jude Bellingham 'couldn't have dreamed it better'

articles.description: Australian Minjee Lee cards an impressive four under 66 to join American Andrea Lee and Thailand's Wichanee Meechai in a three-way lead after the third round of the US Women's Open.
articles.title: US Women's Open: Minjee Lee joins three-way lead into final round

articles.description: Jose Mourinho is set to be named manager of Turkish Super Lig side Fenerbahce.
articles.title: Jose Mourinho: Portuguese set to be named manager of Turkish side Fenerbahce

articles.description: Borussia Dortmund "deserved more" than losing the Champions League final to an "ice cold" Real Madrid, according to their manager Edin Terzic.
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund 0-2 Real Madrid: Edin Terzic 'proud' of team

articles.description: Germany’s Alexander Zverev reaches the French Open last 16 after coming through a nervy five-set thriller against Tallon Griekspoor.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Alexander Zverev beats Tallon Griekspoor at Roland Garros

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka beats her best friend Paula Badosa in the French Open third round, with former Wimbledon champion Elena Rybakina also through.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Aryna Sabalenka beats Paula Badosa, Elena Rybakina wins
